titleStmt.title: Ṣoma dǝggʷā, Salām laki dāgmit samāy

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

availability.licence: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

supportDesc.foliation: Pencil foliation in the upper right corner (1–96).
supportDesc.condition: The sewing is broken and the quires are loose. The parchment has been damaged by humidity and some leaves are stained with water, e.g. . The parchment is occasionally wrinkled, e.g. . The margins of some leaves have been damaged probably by rodents, e.g. . Some lower outer corners are slightly stained with dirt, e.g. on .

item.desc: A white sticker is glued to the inner side of the front board, on the top. The name of is printed on it (‘ቤንት፡ ዩውል፡ የንሰን።’) and the signature ‘MS. Aeth. e. 37’ is written in pencil. Three additional stickers, forming the signature ‘Ms 11’ on it, are glued under the first one.

binding.decoNote: The manuscript is bound in wooden boards and covered with on the spine.

The boards are cut to the same size as the bookblock and have shallow external bevels. The grain runs vertically. The external surface of the boards is polished, while the inner surface exhibits signs of the working tool.
The sewing is a chainstitch on four sewing stations, broken and repaired with a different kind of thread. Both threads are Z-plied.

The small holes close to the head and tail of the quires probably indicate that quire tackets were originally present. A sheet of parchment is folded around and sewn with the bookblock. and are the extensions of this sort of spine lining. A piece of brown leather has been sewn over it as an additional protection.

The original leather slip case is preserved. It is a one-piece, double-walled satchel where the back panel overlaps over the front. The satchel is equipped with long flaps extending from the side panels and a main rounded flap extending from the back to the front panel to cover the opening of the book compartment. The hanging strap is formed by two strips of leather whose ends are overlapped and stitched together. The strap passes through two flaps extending from the bottom panel and slides under a leather belt wrapped around all the sides that also keeps the main flap closed.

history.provenance: The provenance of the manuscript is unknown. Possibly, unit 2 (a single bifolio) originated from another manuscript and was reused as flyleaves at the production of unit 1. Another possibility is that the text in unit 2 (which forms an integral unity and is not connexted to the text in unit 1) was written on the bifolio after it had been used as flyleaves.

msItem.incipit: ምስባክ፡ ዘድራረ፡ ጾም፡ በ፪፡ ዘወረደ፡ እምላዕሉ፡ አይሁ ድ፡ ሰቀሉ፡ ወሚመ፡ ኢያእመሩ፡ እግዚአ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዘየሐዩ፡ በቃሉ፡

msItem.incipit:
ዋዜማ፡ ዘምኵራብ፡ በ፩፡ በዕለተ፡ ሰንበት፡ ቦዐ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ምኵራበ፡ አይሁድ፡ ምሕሮሙ፡ ወይቤሎሙ፡ ለእመ፡ ኪያየ፡ ኢአ
መንክሙ፡ ለግብርየ፡ እመኑ፡ አንትሙ፡ ጊዜ፡ መዋዕለ፡ ዓመታት፡ ዕለታተ፡ ሰንበታት፡ ኢፈለጥክሙ፡ ዕንዳኢ፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላ፡ እስመ፡ ናሁ፡ እግዚእነ፡ በእንቲአነ፡ ገብረ፡ ለነ፡ ሰላመ፡ በመስቀሉ፡ እሞት፡ ባልሐነ፡ እግዚኣ፡ ለሰንበት፡ ተሣሃለነ፨ ፨

msItem.incipit: ዋዜማ፡ ዘመጻጕዕ፡ ውእቱ፡ እግዚአ፡ ለሰንበት፡ ወአቡሃ፡ ለምሕረት፡ ቤትየሰ፡ ቤተ፡ ጸሎት፡ ይሰመይ፡ ቤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወማኅደሩ፡ ለልዑል፡ ቤተ፡ ረሰይክሙ፡ አንትሙ፡ በዓተ፡ ፈያት፡ ቤ፡ አሕየዎ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ለመጻጕዕ፡ ለዘ፴፡ ወ፰ት፡ ክረምተ፡ ሐመ፨
msItem.explicit:
ሰላ፡ ሶበሰ፡ ይሠርቅ፡ ፀሐይ፡ ንሕነኒ፡ ን
ርከብ፡ ሰላመ፡ በትወውክልተ፡ መስቀል፡ አሚነነ፡ አሜን፡ ብሂለነ፡ ተፈሢሐነ፡ ልበነ፡ አንጺሐነ፡ ንሳለማ፡ ለጽዮን፨ ፨

msItem.incipit: ዋዜማ፡ ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ በ፮፡ እንዘ፡ ይነብር፡ እግዚእነ፡ ውስተ፡ ደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ ወይቤሎሙ፡ ለአርዳዒሁ፡ ዑቁኬ፡ ኢያስሕቱክሙ፡ ወንበሩ፡ ድልዋኒክሙ፡ በሰንበት፡ ኢይኩን፡ ጕያክሙ፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላ፡ በ፩፡ እግትዋ፡ ለጽዮን፡ ወሕቀፍዋ፡ ወተናገሩ፡ ሰላመ፡ በውስተ፡ ማኅፈዲሃ፡ እንተ፡ ጸብሐት፡ ንበላ፡ በሐ፡ ወናዕርግ፡ ጸሎተነ፡ በማዕከላ፡ በፍሥሓ፤ መስቀለ፤ ክርስቶስ፤ ለእለ፤ አመነ፤ ይኩነነ፤ መርሐ፨ ፨ ፨

msItem.incipit: ዋዜማ፡ ዘገብር፡ ኄር፡ በ፬፡ ገብር፡ ኄር፡ ወገብር፡ ምዕመን፡ ገብር፡ ዘአሥመሮ፡ ለእግዚኡ፡ ዘበምልክናከ፡ ሠናየ፡ ገበርከ፡ ብፁዕ፡ አንተ፡ ገብር፡ ኄር፨
msItem.explicit: ሰላ፡ ስብሐት፡ ለእግዚአበሰማያት፡ ወሰላም፡ በምድር፡ ለዘበመስቀሉ፡ ተሰዱ፡ አጋንንት፡ ስብሐት፡ ለዘቀደሳ፡ ለሰንበት፨ ፨ ፨

msItem.note: The sets of antiphons for the Third, Sixth, and Ninth Hours for this day contain antiphons for a məhəllā service.

msItem.incipit: ዋዜማ፡ ዘኒቆዲሞስ፡ በ፩፡ ወሀሎ፡ ፩፡ ብእሲ፡ እምፈረሳው ያን፡ ዘስሙ፡ ኒቆዲሞስ፡ ዘሖረ፡ ኀቤሁ፡ ቀዲሙ፡ ሌሊተ፡ ወይቤሎ፡ ለኢየሱስ፡ ዕጓለ፡ አንበሳ፡ ሰከብከ፡ ወኖምከ፡ አንሥአኒ፡ በትእንዛሣዝከ፨
msItem.explicit:
ሰላ፡ በ፪፡ ውእተ፡ ኣሚረ፡ አመ፡ ይገብር፡ እግዚእነ፡ ሆሣዕና፡ በአርያም፡ ተሐውከ፡ ሰማይ፡ ወተፈሥሑ፡ መላእክት፡ በሰማያት፡ እለኒ፡ ሀለዉ፡ ዲበ፡ ምድር፡
ይብሉ፡ ሆሣዕና፡ በአርያም፡ አዕሩግ፡ ወሕፃናት፡ ይብሉ፡ ሆሣዕና፡ ቡሩክ፡ ዘይመጽእ፡ ወተቀበልዎ፡ ሕዝብ፡ ብዙኃን፡ ቦአ፡ ሀገሮ፡ በሰላም፡ ኢየሩሳለም፡ በስብሐት፨ ፨ ፨

msItem.incipit: ምልጣን፡ ዘሠርክ፡ ሆሣዕና፡ በዕምርት፡ ዕለት፡ በዓልነ፡ ንፍሑ፡ ቀርነ፡ በጽዮን፡ ወስብኩ፡ በደብረ፡ መቅደስየ፡ እስመ፡ ይቤ፡ ዛቲ፡ ዕለት፡ በዓለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሆሣዕና፡ በአርያም፡ ቡሩክ፡ አንተ፡ ንጉሠ፡ ፳ኤል፨
msItem.explicit: ዕጣ፡ በ፪፡ ወሠርከሰ፡ አመ፡ ርእሶ፡ ይሰቀል፡ ካልዓ፡ ዕለተ፡ ኮነ፡ እንዘ፡ ያርኢ፡ አርአያ፡ ትንሣኤ፡ ገብረ፡ ንሰብሖ፡ ወንወድሶ፡ በእንተ፡ ትንሣኤ፨ ተፈጸመ፡ ጾመ፡ ድጓ፡ ሠርጐ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨፨፨፨፨፨፨፨፨፨፨

msItem.title: Monday through Wednesday in the Holy Week (?)
msItem.note: This segment begins with an antiphon labelled ዋዜማ፡ ዘሠኑይ፡ (Wāzemā za-śanuy, 'Wāzemā (antiphon) for Monday'). It is appears that the segment contains material for Monday through Wednesday of the Holy Week.

support.p: Holes, from the parchment making process, are present in the folios, e.g. . Others have been repaired by sewing, e.g. .

extent.note: Data on the dimensions of folios taken from .

supportDesc.condition: The parchment has been damaged by humidity and some folios are stained with water, e.g. . The parchment is occasionally wrinkled, e.g. . The margins of some folios have been damaged probably by rodents, e.g. . Some lower outer corners are slightly stained with dirt, e.g. on . The sewing is broken and the quires are loose with the risk of leaf displacement.

layout.note: Data on text area and margin dimensions taken from .
layout.ab: One-column headbands within the textblock separate the weeks (e.g. on ). Chains of red and black dots occasionally separate days (e.g. on ) or services (e.g. on ).
Ruling and pricking are visible. Both primary and ruling pricks are often visible.
Several different ruling patterns are attested in the manuscript: 1E!-1E!-1E!1E!/0-0/0-0/C (e.g. ), 1E!-1E!-1E!1E!/0-0/1C-1C/J (e.g. ).
The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handNote.desc: Fine hand. Characters are regularly spaced. The graphemes ግ and ዚ are occasionally written as a ligature, e.g. on .

decoDesc.summary: Headbands appear to be contemporary with the making of the manuscript and to have been executed by the same hand.

decoNote.desc: Frame with uneven lines filled with a pattern of thin strings knotted by loops at its centre.
Smaller bands, marking incipits, present small variations on the pattern found on .

item.desc: Omitted word(s) have been added by the hand that furnished the text with mələkkət in the margin (e.g. ) or interlineally (e.g. ). Different type of deletions: erasures (e.g. ), erasures with subsequent addition of line fillers (e.g. ), expunctuation (), strike-through (). On , a rubricated word has been corrected by writing the correct form in black on top of the rubricated letters.
Pen trials by different hands with different inks ().

msItem.title: Three prayers
msItem.note: These prayers form part of the texts that are sometimes catalogued as .

msItem.title: Prayer to Mary (Salām laki dāgmit samāy…)
msItem.incipit: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ዳግሚት፡ ሰማይ፡ ሰ፡ ለኪ፡ ሙፃዓ፡ ፀሐይ፡ ሰ፡ አንቀጸ፡ መድኃኒት፡ ሰ፡ ሙዳየ፡ እፍረት፡ ሰ፡ ገነተ፡ ትፍሥሕት፡ ሰእመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ፀባዖት፡ ሰ፡ ዘምስለ፡ ሰጊድ፡ ንኤምኃኪ፡ ለባርኮትነ፡ ስፍሒ፡ እዴኪ። መንግሥተ፡ ንጉሥ፡ ባርኪ፡ ወኪያነኒ፡ እሞተ፡ ሙስና፡
msItem.explicit: ሰ፡ በከመ፡ ልማድኪ፡ በሊ፡ ኀበ፡ ወልድኪ፡ ከሃሊ፡ ኦርኅሩኅ፡ ኢተበቃሊ፡ ያጠፍኦኑ፡ ለስዕል፡ ሠዓሊ፡ ኪነተከ፡ ዘትካት፡ ሀሊ።

msItem.title: Prayer to Jesus Christ (Səbḥat laka nəngər kʷəllo səbḥatika…)
msItem.incipit: ስብሐት፡ ለከ፡ ንንግር፡ ኵሎ፡ ስብሐቲከ፡ በአናቅጺሃ፡ ለጽዮን፡ ማኅደረ፡ ብዙኅ፡ ሰላም፡ ዘአንቃሕከነ፡ እምነ፡ ንዋም፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ወልደ፡ ማ። ሰ፡ ላዕለ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ወኃጥአን፡ ብርሃነ፡ ጸጋ፡ ምውቅ፡ ዘታሠርቅ፡ ለነ፡ እምነ፡ ምስራቅ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ፀሐየ፡ ጽድቅ።
msItem.explicit:
ሰ፡ አኰቴተ፡ ስብሐት፡ ወትረ፡ ለመንግሥትከ፡ ስቡሕ፡ ጊዜ፡ እምንዋ
ምነ፡ ንነቅሕ፡ ወናቄርብ፡ ለከ፡ በቃለ፡ ክላህ፡ ወንፌኑ፡ ስብሐተ፡ በነግህ።

msItem.title: Prayer to the Trinity (Səbḥat lakəmu səllus qəddus…)
msItem.incipit: ዘስላሤ፡ ስብሐት፡ ለክሙ፡ ስሉስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ማዕምራነ፡ ክልኤ፡ አእምሮ፡ ለብሃን፡ ዓቢይ፡ ዘፈጠሮ፡ ቃልክሙ፡ በተናግሮ። ስብ፡ ሰዓተ፡ ሌሊት፡ ስላሤ፡ ዘወሰንክሙ፡ በጎህ፡ ወዘአክበርክሙ፡ በጸዳል፡ ብሩህ፡ ፀሐየ፡ እምነ፡ ወርኅ።
msItem.explicit:
ስ፡ ከመ፡ ኀብረ፡ ሰደ፡ ሥጋየ፡ አመ፡ በኃጢአት፡
ቄሐ፡ ኀዘን፡ ብየ፡ አምጣነ፡ በዝሐ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ዘዮም፡ ወዘአሜሃ፡ በጽባሕ፡ ሀቡኒ፡ ፍሥሐ።።።። ስብሐት፡ በል፡

support.p: A hole from the parchment making process has been repaired by sewing on .

layout.note: Data on margin dimensions taken from .

handNote.seg: Words within the first line of textual units (ለኪ, ማር) on ; elements of certain punctuation marks on .

item.desc: Omitted letters and, in one case, a word have been added interlineally (e.g. ). One letter has been marked for deletion by strokes above and under the letter ().
Throughout, there are blank spaces that were presumably intended to be filled with rubricated letters.
